title: Support Tickets
body: click on "my tickets" in support, and can't see anything :(

replies.body: Try logging out and back in to see if that fixes being able to pull up your tickets. If that doesn't work, you should be able to see the tickets in your email as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XZ2YJsjg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-28T02:04:55.612+0000)
>
> Try logging out and back in to see if that fixes being able to pull up your tickets. If that doesn't work, you should be able to see the tickets in your email as well.

tried, doesn't work :(
